definition: devil/You devil! (as joke or insult)/the departed
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
ghost of a person who died by hanging/hanged person/(coll.) inchworm/hangman (word game)

sentences.english: The police arrested a fall guy.
It is unethical for a boss to use someone as a whipping boy.
sentences.chinese: 一名老闆把別人當爲替死鬼，是很不道德的。

sentences.english: His hanging face, like a devil's sick of sin;
sentences.chinese: 他的一張吊死鬼的臉，就像惡魔一樣可怖。

sentences.english: Death grew pale within the grave.
sentences.chinese: 墳塋中的死鬼，臉色鐵青。

sentences.english: They all hope their women to be fall guys for them.
sentences.chinese: 他們呢，都只希望女人替他做替死鬼你懂不懂啊？

sentences.english: That devil resembles my home like collecting administration fee, a month comes only.
sentences.chinese: 我家那死鬼就像收管理費一樣，一個月只來一次。

sentences.english: It looks like an innocent bystander was killed instead of you.
sentences.chinese: 看起來是一個無辜的旁觀者當了你的替死鬼。

sentences.english: His face was ghastly white twitching with suppressed pain.
sentences.chinese: 面孔像死鬼一般蒼白，忍痛痙攣着。

sentences.english: Is that your dead husband's birthday?
sentences.chinese: 是你那死鬼丈夫的生日麼？

definition: my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
(derog.) old but still alive/old fart/old bastard
